description.description: I am leading Hoagie, the development club aiming to create an ecosystem of campus applications.

content.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"heading-2","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Hoagie is a campus application hub and a development club at Princeton","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"As the President of Hoagie, I help organize and manage the operations of the club and its projects. I am also working on the core services of its shared application API and components. While still in its early stages, Hoagie is working on making it easier for students to create applications tailored to make our campus community a better place, especially with its now-virtual format. You can learn more about the club and what it is all about at ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"hoagie.io","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{"uri":"https://www.hoagie.io/"}},{"nodeType":"text","value":".","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The first project which uses the shared API is Hoagie Mail, which allows students to send emails with club information to everyone on campus instantly, avoiding the technical limitations of the current system.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}}]}
